QuestData.Title: On Ghostly Wings
QuestData.Description:
We will meet you back where our journey began, $n.
Corin and I have been separated for many years. We have so much to catch up on.
As a token of our gratitude we will remain in the area to help you in your travels through this cursed land.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Kelya Moonfall in Zin-Azshari.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kelya Moonfall in Zin-Azshari.
